Earth.Initial Text: This is Earth, lots of nice trees.

Choices.Text: I want a place to live!

2LPlaceLiveChoices.Dialogue: If you want to live here, you should look like one of us.

InitChoices.Dialogue: I love talking to other people every once in a while.

Choices.Text: What do you guys do here?

2LWhatElseChoices.Dialogue: The people around here like goggles a lot.

Choices.Text: Okay, I'll go get a goggle

2LHowDoingChoices.Dialogue: I guess I'm doing fine. Thanks for checking in on me.

2LLoveItChoices.Dialogue: Aw thanks, we've worked hard collectively to really make sure this place is beautiful.

InitChoices.Dialogue: So, you've met others, what do you think?

Choices.Text: What else do I need to do?

2LWhatElseChoices.Dialogue: Go pick up some disguises and see which one suits you.

2LHowDoingChoices.Dialogue: I'm doing great. Thanks for checking in on me.

4LYesQuestionnareChoices.Dialogue: Okay final question, Yes or No?

InitChoices.Dialogue: Would you like to live here?
Go talk to the Leader first.
So you talked to him then?

Choices.Text: What else do I need to do?

2LWhatElseChoices.Dialogue: The people around here like the pink blob a lot. Go touch it if your worthy.

2LHowDoingChoices.Dialogue: Thanks for asking, I'm doing okay.

4LSilentChoices.Dialogue: Thanks for spending some silent time with me.

InitChoices.Dialogue: Would you like to live here?
